articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen set a new European unbeaten record of 49 games by securing a late draw with Roma to reach the Europa League final.
articles.title: Leverkusen go 49 unbeaten and make Europa League final

articles.description: Aston Villa's Europa Conference League run ends at the semi-final stage as opponents Olympiakos set up a final with Fiorentina.
articles.title: Villa out as Olympiakos reach Conference League final

articles.description: Iga Swiatek, Coco Gauff and Naomi Osaka all make it through comfortably to the last 32 of the Italian Open in Rome.
articles.title: Italian Open: Iga Swiatek, Coco Gauff and Naomi Osaka win in Rome

articles.description: Watch as a Milwaukee Brewers fan catches a second MLB home run in three days, this time for opposing team Kansas City Royal's Bobby Witt Jr.
articles.title: MLB: Milwaukee Brewers fan catches second home run in three days

articles.description: Plans for a £61.8m redevelopment of two stands at Lord's are approved by the Marylebone Cricket Club's members.
articles.title: Lord's redevelopment: Plans approved to improve Allen and Tavern stands

articles.description: Seven-time winner Michael van Gerwen clinches his place in the Premier League Darts play-offs despite losing 6-5 to world champion Luke Humphries in the night 15 final in Leeds.
articles.title: Premier League Darts: Michael van Gerwen confirms play-off spot in night 15 in Leeds

articles.description: Chelsea to decide Mauricio Pochettino's future at the end of the season, Arsenal looking at re-signing keeper Wojciech Szczesny, plus more.
articles.title: Chelsea to hold review on Pochettino future - Friday's gossip

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen's quest to complete an invincible treble stays alive as they get past Roma to reach the Europa League final.
articles.title: Bayer Leverkusen: Will Xabi Alonso's side win an invincible treble?

articles.description: England and Saracens number eight Billy Vunipola is issued with a formal warning by the RFU following his  arrest in Majorca.
articles.title: Billy Vunipola given 'formal warning' by RFU after arrest

articles.description: Fifa is facing the threat of legal action over the calendar that clubs say is "beyond saturation".
articles.title: Club World Cup: Fifa threatened with legal action over expanded tournament
